name: Koji
public_notice: Koji has migrated to a new contract address (0x7eb567F5c781EE8e47C7100DC5046955503fc26A). For more information, please visit: https://twitter.com/kojiearth/status/1471646873383489537

description.en: The Koji Earth project aims to provide KOJI token-holders with original comic book NFTs created by the Amco-studio. Also, the project is developing an online store with official KOJI Merchandise. Automatically, the KOJI’s smart contract deducts 3% from every transaction and spreads it as follow: 1% goes to charity, 1% goes to holders, 0.5% goes to the burning wallet, and the rest 0.5% goes to the growth fund.
